original_title: National Child Protection Authority to be summoned before COPA
original_body_lines: COLOMBO(News 1st): The National Child Protection Authority has been summoned before the Committee on Public Accounts.
Its Chairman State Minister Lasantha Alagiyawanna says by summoning public institutions before the Committee on Public Accounts many hidden matters in those institutions will be revealed.
COPA Chairman State Minister Lasantha Alagiyawanna says that as a result these institutions will rectify their mistakes.
COPA Chairman says that several other institutions will be called before the committee in the future.
Thai King takes elephant Sak Surin (Muthuraja) under his patronage
